resources.string: A new device can access your encrypted data
"A new device (%s) signed in to your Samsung account. It can access your encrypted data. If this wasn't you, change your Samsung account password right away."
For security, access to Enhanced data protection settings is blocked because an incorrect recovery code was entered too many times.
Before encrypting your data, you need to generate a recovery code. This code can be used to recover your data if you lose access to your trusted devices.
Call and text on your tablet
"Can't use Enhanced data protection because of your account country or region."
"Change your recovery code if it's lost or you think someone has it."
"All of this application's data will be deleted permanently. This includes all files, settings, accounts, databases etc."
Connect to a Wi-Fi or mobile network and try again.
Continue apps from one device to the other
"Control your phone with your tablet's keyboard and mouse"
Item at position %d cannot be dragged.
Enter your recovery code to confirm you can recover your data if you need to.
"For security, you can't access Enhanced data protection settings on a phone that's been rooted or changed in an unauthorized way."
"For security, you can't access Enhanced data protection settings on a tablet that's been rooted or changed in an unauthorized way."
Generate a recovery code and keep it safe
I wrote down my recovery code
If this problem continues, contact us through Samsung Members for support.
"If you don't have your recovery code, you can't recover your encrypted data."
"If you lose this code, your data can't be recovered."
"If you're in the middle of a task on your phone, you can continue on your tablet by tapping the icon that appears on the Recents screen. It also works from your tablet to your phone."
Incorrect recovery code entered too many times. Closing app…
"Protect your cloud data with end-to-end encryption. This ensures no one can access your data but you, even if there's a data breach."
"Multi control lets you use a single keyboard and mouse to control your phone and tablet. You can even copy and paste or drag things between them like they're one device."
Send pictures, videos, and documents from your phone to your tablet or from your tablet to your phone using Quick Share.
Send pictures, videos, and documents from your phone to your tablet or from your tablet to your phone using S Share.
Something went wrong. Try again later.
"The Enhanced data protection service didn't respond. Try again."
"The recovery code for your encrypted data was changed from another device. If this wasn't you, change your Samsung account password right away."
This is a temporary problem. Try again.
Through your Samsung account, your phone and tablet can do more together.
To recover your data, you need to enter your recovery code.

To sync, back up, and recover data from %s, you need to download your encryption key from one of your other devices. The other device needs to be connected to a network for you to download the key from it.
Update the following apps to continue:
"Use your tablet to make and answer calls and send and receive texts using your phone's number and mobile plan."
"Write down the code below and keep it in a safe place. It's your only way to recover your data if lose access to your trusted devices."
Your recovery code lets you get your data back if you lose all your trusted devices and forget your account password. Without it, not even Samsung can recover your data.
